description: Would you sacrifice your own life to save the one you love the most?
There is a big event and you are invited, but you don’t know anyone. Would you go?
You are up against a threat you can’t handle. Would you stay and fight?
You have a fight with your true love and it’s her fault. Would you apologize anyway?
You are in captivity and you are being interrogated. Would you try to talk your way out of it?
You have been granted “license to kill”. Do you use it to avenge someone you hate?
You are given the opportunity to be extremely wealthy. But be forever alone. Would you accept it?
You can have super strength but in expense of intelligence. Would you choose super strength anyway?
You can decide to end violence, but doing so all violent people would die. Would you make that decision anyway?
You are about to make a trip to the unknown. Would you fully prepare yourself before you go?
If you could be invisible for one day, would you try to make money out of it?
You can teleport yourself anywhere you want but everytime you do it you lose one year of your life. Would you do it?
